1Abraham Lincoln wrote and signed this letter.Lincoln penned this letter while en route toSpringfield, Illinois, having left Washington, DC, on March 20.  He would make his way home via St. Louis
                  by railroad, steamer, and stagecoach, arriving in Springfield on March 31.Lincoln mostly likely wrote this letter on March 26.  He met Benjamin Bond on that
                  date in St. Louis.  Bond was on his way toWashington, DC, to lobby for an appointment as U.S. Marshal forIllinois.The Lincoln Log: A Daily Chronology of the Life of Abraham Lincoln, 20 March 1849,http://www.thelincolnlog.org/Results.aspx?type=CalendarDay&day=1849-03-20; 26 March 1849,http://www.thelincolnlog.org/Results.aspx?type=CalendarDay&day=1849-03-26; 31 March 1849,http://www.thelincolnlog.org/Results.aspx?type=CalendarDay&day=1849-03-31.
